title: Foundations of Heuristic Task Analysis for e-Learning Course Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Personal device utilization per learner, with continuous feedback provided through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze e-learning course development stages by applying the HTA (Hierarchical Task Analysis) methodology.
Learners identify and explain heuristic strategies applied in complex work environments.
Learners propose customized instructional design processes through real-world case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
